name: Selfless Potion
description: <c=@flavor>For those who put others before themselves in this time of need.<c>

name: Gift of Sprockets
description: Double-click to create a sprocket generator node in your home instance. The node can be gathered from once per day.

name: Aetherblade Code Fragment
description: Double-click to combine 25 code fragments to complete a cypher.

name: Synergetic Tempered Spinal Blades
description:
<c=@flavor>We faced Scarlet at our door, and that day we brought the fight to her.<c>

Cannot be used in the Mystic Forge if transmuted.

name: Powerful Potion of Slaying Scarlet's Armies

details.description:
+10% damage vs. Toxic Alliance, Watchwork, Aetherblade, and Molten Alliance
-10% damage from Toxic Alliance, Watchwork, Aetherblade, and Molten Alliance
+15% Experience from kills

• Crafting Stations

Combine in the Mystic Forge with Blade Shards, Radiant Dust, and Iron Ingots to create a Spinal Blade Pack back item.

<c=@flavor>Backside reads: "Caithe, someday you'll see. Tyria needs me. -Scarlet."<c>
